title: MEATLOAF
directions: Mix all but the glaze in a large bowl until well blended. Spray 9x13 pan with Pam. Lightly press the meat mixture into the pan. Spread thin layer of ketchup over the meatloaf. Cover with foil. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. 15 minutes. Remove foil and continue to bake for 1/2 hour at 350.
